query:
ALTER TABLE report_requests 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS assignedTo INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS salesRepCode VARCHAR(50) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS leadSource VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'website',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentStatus ENUM('pending', 'paid', 'refunded') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS priority ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS internalNotes TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS scheduledDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS completedDate TIMESTAMP NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3LkhXw7W2NLietY.root --database a7GnrUTuzTDTFdbLnSt79K --execute ALTER TABLE report_requests 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS assignedTo INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS salesRepCode VARCHAR(50) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS leadSource VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'website',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentStatus ENUM('pending', 'paid', 'refunded') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS priority ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent') DEFAULT 'medium' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS internalNotes TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS scheduledDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS completedDate TIMESTAMP NULL;
